name: str::traits::<impl slice::index::SliceIndex<str> for range::RangeInclusive<usize>>::index_mut

range::RangeInclusive::<usize>::into_sli.doc:
Converts to an exclusive `Range` for `SliceIndex` implementations.
 The caller is responsible for dealing with `last == usize::MAX`.

slice::index::SliceIndex::index_mut.doc:
Returns a mutable reference to the output at this location, panicking
 if out of bounds.
